description: A collection item that can be displayed in various layouts

props.name: image
props.description: See `<k-image-frame>` or `<k-icon-frame>` for all available options

props.name: width
props.description: Width (e.g. `"1/2"`) of the parent column is used to set the srcset sizes accordingly

props.name: buttons
props.description: Additional inline buttons in the item's footer

props.name: info
props.description: The optional info text that will be show next or below the main text

props.name: selectable
props.description: If `false`, the select checkbox will be disabled

props.name: selecting
props.description:
If `true`, the item's checkbox or radio button
will be shown to select the item

props.name: sortable
props.description: If `true`, the sort handle will be shown on hover

props.name: target
props.description: Sets a target attribute if a link is also set

props.name: text
props.description: The main text for the item
